column1: It's hard to evaluate if you're sick with coronavirus when you already are chronically fatigued and not-infrequently feverish. My throat is sore and I had to use my inhaler today so I'm a bit panicky.

It's hard to evaluate if you're sick with coronavirus when you already are chronically fatigued and not-infrequently feverish. My throat is sore and I had to use my inhaler today so I'm a bit panicky.
